statements: SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_transformations;
SELECT id, input_data FROM data_cleansing_transformations WHERE transformation_type = 'trim';
SELECT id, cleansed_data FROM data_cleansing_transformations WHERE cleansing_trigger >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transformation_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM data_cleansing_transformations GROUP BY transformation_type;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_transformations ORDER BY cleansing_trigger DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_transformations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT input_data, cleansing_trigger FROM data_cleansing_transformations WHERE transformation_type = 'Normalization';
SELECT id, transformation_type, cleansing_trigger FROM data_cleansing_transformations ORDER BY cleansing_trigger DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_transformations WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT id, input_data, cleansed_data FROM data_cleansing_transformations WHERE id > 3 AND transformation_type LIKE 'Validation%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing;
SELECT id, raw_data, cleansed_data FROM data_cleansing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, raw_data, cleansed_data FROM data_cleansing WHERE raw_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM transformation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT original_data, transformed_data FROM transformation WHERE transformed_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT raw_data, cleansed_data FROM data_cleansing WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, original_data FROM transformation WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND transformed_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing WHERE raw_data LIKE '%error%' OR cleansed_data LIKE '%error%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM transformation;
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing;
SELECT id, data FROM data_cleansing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT last_cleansed, data FROM data_cleansing WHERE last_cleansed < NOW();
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM logs WHERE log_type = 'error';
SELECT raw_data, transformed_data FROM transformation WHERE transformation_trigger = 'manual';
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing;
SELECT id, data FROM data_cleansing ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, last_cleansed FROM data_cleansing WHERE cleansing_trigger = 'manual';
SELECT * FROM transformation WHERE last_transformed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_type FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT id, name, age FROM table2 WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, address, city, state FROM table3 WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT id, amount, category FROM table4 WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, date_of_birth, gender FROM table2 WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, name FROM table1 WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT city, state FROM table3 WHERE id = 10
SELECT * FROM table2 WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT id, amount, category FROM table4 WHERE amount > 100.00
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM raw_data_table;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_description FROM business_rules_table;
SELECT log_id, cleansing_action, timestamp FROM cleansing_logs_table;
SELECT id, transformed_data, transformation_timestamp FROM transformed_data_table;
SELECT pipeline_id, pipeline_name, status, completion_timestamp FROM data_pipeline_status_table;
SELECT * FROM raw_data_table;
SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM raw_data_table WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM business_rules_table WHERE rule_name LIKE '%validation%';
SELECT pipeline_name, status FROM data_pipeline_status_table WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT id, transformed_data FROM transformed_data_table ORDER BY transformation_timestamp DESC;
